name: com.unity.material-property-provider
description:
A MonoBehaviour based class that will automatically set its Renderers with a MaterialPropertyBlock built from fields and properties marked with MaterialProperty Attribute.
When using SRP Batcher, unique instances of materials will be made at runtime for optimal performances.

samples.description: A simple Material Property Provider and its Shader Graph for drawing Radial Gradients on Quads or Sprites.
A Material Property Provider driving properties on several renderers with different materials.

A scene with 729 Material Property Providers, each assigning random colors to two renderers with 3 materials.
The use of Material Property Blocks can be forced on to compare performances with material instantiation.
